title: Asparagus with Lime and Mint
directions: 1 Heat the oil in a wide saut√© or frying pan on medium-high. When the oil is hot, add the asparagus and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste, cooking for about 5-6 minutes until just cooked through, but still with some firmness.
2 Put on a plate and squeeze lime juice over the asparagus and sprinkle on the mint.
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons of olive, sunflower, or grapeseed oil
1-2 fresh limes (yielding a total of 1 1/2 Tablespoons of juice)
1 teaspoon of fresh mint, chopped or cut in a chiffonade*
